youtube.title: What is Esotropia? Eye Alignment & Biology Explained
youtube.description: Learn the science behind Esotropia, a condition where one or both eyes turn inward. In this video, we break down the biology of 'crossed eyes' and how eye muscles function. Perfect for students and medical enthusiasts looking to understand ophthalmology basics. Subscribe for more biology facts!
